biotools.summary: a novel tool for comprehensive analysis of tumor-purity in methylation array data based on random forest regression | RF model and functions to estimate tumor purity using methylation data | Install minfi and RF_purify package from GitHub | R-package to predict ABSOLUTE and ESTIMATE tumor purity using a Random Forest regression model trained on TCGA Illumina 450k DNA-methylation array data. Purity prediction functions can be applied to 450k and 850k array data preprocessed with the Bioconductor package minfi
